title: Snowballfight
story: Coconut macaroons are the best! â€“ No, vanilla crescents! The elves have split into two parties over which are the best cookies and are now fighting each other with snowballs (hopefully without stones).
content: Each player has 5 throws. You throw at the cans on the table (elves). After the round, the game is set up for the next player.
points: Enter the number of cans that have fallen off the table in the corresponding #field.
